location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.5529 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of Kemball's previous letter (folios 241-46) reporting on the foundering and plunder of a Muscat boat on her way to Zanzibar. Malet writes that the Government will await further reports on the incident from Kemball.
